Why are you linking us to the First Contract video?

Congrats, Maxmaps.

Also, this is the correct link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/298-It-turns-out-PR-is-short-for-Producer

Link fixed, hopefully.

Usually I'm good at linking the right thing.

Congrats Maxmaps! I'll be interested to see how the communication between Squad and the community changes, it's definitely a big challenge to keep all or most of us happy.

You may want to contact Rowsdower for his supplier of flame-resistant clothing, I'm pretty sure he buys in bulk.
